page.title: 12Housing in Aust
page.content: Most of Aust village is cut off from the River Severn by the carriageway which leads to the Severn Road Bridge.Aust is a pretty village with a variety of well kept houses.There are detached,semi-detatched and terraced houses and a number of cottages and bungalows. Some of the houses only have one bedroom, others have as many as six. We came across a rank of small old houses which seemed to be for senior citizens. Some houses appeared very old, others much newer or at least modernised. All the houses had gardens which looked very attractive. We also saw some farm houses.
